title: E-Commerce Web Application ‚Äì Test Automation
description: ‚û• Designed and executed 200+ manual test cases in TestRail covering Functional, Regression, and Integration testing, with Jira for defect tracking and reporting.
‚û• Performed UI, API, and database validation to ensure end-to-end functionality and data consistency.
‚û• Automated core modules ‚Äî Login, Product Search, Add to Cart, and Checkout ‚Äî using Selenium WebDriver, Java, and TestNG.
‚û• Implemented Page Object Model (POM) and Data-Driven Testing (DDT) frameworks integrated with Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, generating detailed Allure and Extent Reports.
‚û• Enhanced regression suite efficiency by 40% through reusable scripts, centralized test management, and consistent coverage across builds.

title: Mercury Banking Application - Manual Testing (Finance Domain)
description: ‚û• Executed 80+ manual test cases in TestRail covering Functional, Regression, and Integration testing across core banking modules like Fund Transfers, Dashboard, and Card Management.
‚û• Validated end-to-end workflows including UI, transaction history, and API responses ensuring accurate account balances and data consistency.
‚û• Managed defect lifecycle in Jira ‚Äî from logging to closure ‚Äî collaborating with developers to resolve high-severity bugs.
‚û• Performed negative, usability, and cross-browser testing to ensure smooth performance and responsiveness across Chrome, Edge, and Firefox.
‚û• Delivered detailed test reports and traceability matrix improving overall release quality and test coverage within Agile sprints.

title: Simple Books API ‚Äì Postman Functional & Regression Testing Project
description: ‚û• Designed and validated CRUD operations for endpoints like /books, /orders, and /status to ensure accurate API responses and error handling.
‚û• Performed positive, negative, and boundary testing using Postman Collections and Environments for organized, reusable workflows.
‚û• Implemented data-driven testing with dynamic variables and parameterized request data to enhance test flexibility and maintainability.
‚û• Executed automated regression runs via Postman Collection Runner and Newman, validating response codes, payloads, and JSON schema consistency.
‚û• Logged defects in Jira and maintained detailed test documentation aligned with SDLC and QA best practices.
